resources.string: Please enter a name for the repository
Remote name \"%s\" does not match local name \"%s\"
No PAT (Personal Access Token) found for user. Please provide a valid PAT with access to the repository.
Clone remote GitNotes repository with PAT
Login using a PAT (Personal Access Token) and clone a given remote GitNotes repository via an HTTPS link.
Create a new local GitNotes repository. An HTTPS link to a remote repository can be added for the local repository later.
Change the selected user profile or create new profile
Reset the current Personal Access Token if any is set
Delete all notes which are stored locally
Delete Git repositories in storage, does not delete repositories in the database
Delete the selected user profile if any is selected
ERROR: No text from intent found
No user was found, no token was deleted
